name: Scarpa Rapid Light Trail Shoes - Women's
description: Light shoes for nimble hiking. Made from recycled material, the sticky sole provides excellent traction on sketchy terrain and keeps you quick on your feet. Its cush EVA midsole provides a balanced ride on uneven ground, while preventing your foot from feeling every rock and root.Upper made from suede, synthetic leather, and recycled polyester mesh.Lining, laces and webbing are 100% recycled polyester.Moulded EVA midsole with an H-EVA plate for protection against impact.EVA has an additive to promote disintegration in landfill conditions.Rubber toe rand to protect against stumps, rocks, and other kickable objects.Sticky Speed Lite rubber outsole, made from 25% recycled rubber.
